title: Add Admin User Guide content to the User Guide page

requirements.text: Extend the existing User Guide page to include an Admin-focused guide section that is only available to authenticated admin users.

quotes: Also add user guide for admin.

acceptanceCriteria: When the current user is an admin, the User Guide page shows an additional tab/section labeled "For Admins" alongside the existing Buyer and Seller guides.
When the current user is not an admin (including anonymous users), the Admin guide content is not visible.
All Admin guide headings and body text are written in clear English and follow the same step-by-step style as the Buyer/Seller guides.
The Admin guide includes guidance for at least: accessing admin-only navigation, viewing/updating Company Account/bank details, and understanding admin access restrictions.

requirements.text: Add and render a new static illustration asset for the Admin User Guide in the same style and convention as the existing Buyer/Seller guide illustrations, and display it in the Admin guide section on the User Guide page.

quotes: Also add user guide for admin.

acceptanceCriteria: A new generated image file exists under frontend/public/assets/generated using the filename specified in imageRequirements.required.
When the current user is an admin, the Admin guide section displays the new illustration at the top in a bordered/rounded container consistent with the Buyer/Seller guide sections.
The admin illustration has meaningful alt text in English describing what is shown visually.

constraints: Frontend files under frontend/src/components/ui are read-only and must not be edited directly.
Do not modify the immutable authentication/actor hooks (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts/tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts). Instead, compose existing hooks such as useIsAdmin().
Keep the existing /user-guide route and existing Buyer/Seller guide content intact.
nonGoals: Do not add new admin backend capabilities or change admin authorization rules as part of this request.
Do not add new navigation items for the admin guide outside of the existing "User Guide" entry unless explicitly requested.
Do not implement ONDC integration or any new marketplace functionality beyond the admin guide content.

required: Illustrated admin workflow guide graphic in a clean, minimal style (bozarhaat-user-guide-admin.dim_1600x900.png)
